tests

Class DGADPSOTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.DGADPSOTest

  • public class DGADPSOTest
extends java.lang.Object
    a demo test-driver class exercises the combination (ensemble) of two meta-heuristics, namely DGA and DPSO in optimizing a single function, through the Observer Design Pattern implemented for these processes. This program creates two optimizers, a DGA and a DPSO object, and registers each one as an observer for the other. Whenever a new incumbent is found for one process, it is sent to the other process which "receives" it as a new "immigrant" and continues with its search process. The class demonstrates the use of ensembles in optimization as the two optimizers operate in parallel and coordinate in a rather loose way by exchanging their incumbents. Notice: such optimization ensembles are inherently non-deterministic due to thread scheduling, so repeated runs with the same parameters are not guaranteed to produce the same result, even when the random number generators are completely specified.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
